resources.string: A web server that allows you to serve maps and data from a variety of formats to standard clients
A web-based application and platform for developing GISs and for deploying SDIs
A C++ translator library for more than 200 raster and vector geospatial data formats
A Web Client JavaScript Framework for displaying distributed cartographic data
An open source software for spatial data infrastructures and the geospatial web
A catalog application to manage spatially referenced resources
